languages.text: {n}Что-то в вашем голосе заставляет пыточника замереть, а потом склонить голову набок. За зеркальной маской вы не видите выражения его лица, однако через мгновение ксенос с шипением скрючивается и срывается с места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Что-то в вашем голосе заставляет пыточника замереть, а потом склонить голову набок. За зеркальной маской вы не видите выражения его лица, однако через мгновение ксенос с шипением скрючивается и срывается с места.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то в вашем голосе заставляет пыточника замереть, а потом склонить голову набок. За зеркальной маской вы не видите выражения его лица, однако через мгновение ксенос с шипением скрючивается и срывается с места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

traits.locale_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

traits.locale_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}あなたの声に何かを感じたのか、拷問官は首を傾げた。鏡張りのマスクのせいで彼の表情は見えないが、しばらくして異種族はシューシューとした音を立て、肩をすくめ、そそくさと逃げていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの声に何かを感じたのか、拷問官は首を傾げた。鏡張りのマスクのせいで彼の表情は見えないが、しばらくして異種族はシューシューとした音を立て、肩をすくめ、そそくさと逃げていった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}你的声音让行刑者住了手。他歪了歪头，你看不到他镜子面具之下的表情，但过了一会儿，他哼了一声，耸了耸肩，匆匆离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的声音让行刑者住了手。他歪了歪头，你看不到他镜子面具之下的表情，但过了一会儿，他哼了一声，耸了耸肩，匆匆离开了。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Algo en tu voz hace que el torturador se detenga y ladee la cabeza. No puedes ver su expresión con la máscara reflectante, pero, un momento después, el xenos sisea, encorva los hombros y se escabulle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo en tu voz hace que el torturador se detenga y ladee la cabeza. No puedes ver su expresión con la máscara reflectante, pero, un momento después, el xenos sisea, encorva los hombros y se escabulle.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Der Ton deiner Stimme lässt den Folterer innehalten. Er legt den Kopf schief. Wegen der Spiegelmaske siehst du seinen Gesichtsausdruck nicht, aber einen Augenblick später zischt der Xenos, krümmt die Schultern und huscht davon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ton deiner Stimme lässt den Folterer innehalten. Er legt den Kopf schief. Wegen der Spiegelmaske siehst du seinen Gesichtsausdruck nicht, aber einen Augenblick später zischt der Xenos, krümmt die Schultern und huscht davon.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Bien que son masque vous dissimule son expression, quelque chose dans votre voix impressionne suffisamment le tortionnaire pour le pousser à se figer et à pencher la tête sur le côté. Un instant plus tard, le xénos émet un sifflement, rentre la tête dans les épaules et prend ses jambes à son cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que son masque vous dissimule son expression, quelque chose dans votre voix impressionne suffisamment le tortionnaire pour le pousser à se figer et à pencher la tête sur le côté. Un instant plus tard, le xénos émet un sifflement, rentre la tête dans les épaules et prend ses jambes à son cou.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}İşkenceci, ses tonuna tepki olarak durup başını yana eğiyor. Aynalı maskesi sebebiyle yüz ifadesini göremesen de zeno, hemen sonrasında tıslıyor ve kamburunu çıkarıp hızla uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice gives the torturer pause, and he tilts his head. You cannot see his expression because of the mirrored mask, but, a moment later, the xenos hisses, hunches his shoulders, and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses tonun yüzünden işkenceci durup başını yana eğiyor. Aynalı maskesi sebebiyle yüz ifadesini göremesen de, çok geçmeden zeno tıslayarak kamburunu çıkarıp hızla uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer
